text: {{Infobox settlement | official_name = Viganello | settlement_type = Quarter | native_name = | image_map = Karte Quartier Viganello 2013.png | image_shield = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Switzerland | subdivision_type1 = Canton | subdivision_name1 = Ticino | subdivision_type2 = District | subdivision_name2 = Lugano | subdivision_type3 = City | subdivision_name3 = Lugano | area_total_km2 = 1.2 | area_footnotes = | population_as_of = 2012-12-31 | population_total = 7466 | population_footnotes = | population_density_km2 = auto }} Viganello is a quarter of the city of Lugano, Switzerland. Until 2004, it was a municipality on its own. Then it was created to Lugano. == References == == Other websites == * Official site of the quarter * Category:Former municipalities of Ticino Category:Neighbourhoods in Lugano
title: Viganello
